languages.text: [draft]The Psyker creates a terrible vortex of telekinetic power, pulling everyone within {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} range from the edge of the vortex toward it and repeating this pull each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Enemies make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −5×(psy rating) penalty. Any enemy that fails the test moves psy rating cells toward the vortext. Enemies that succeed move half that distance. At the end of every Psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} everyone within the vortex suffers triple damage of Assail.

traits.locale_text: [draft]The Psyker creates a terrible vortex of telekinetic power, pulling everyone within psy rating range from the edge of the vortex toward it and repeating this pull each round. Enemies make a Toughness test with a −5×(psy rating) penalty. Any enemy that fails the test moves psy rating cells toward the vortext. Enemies that succeed move half that distance. At the end of every Psyker's turn everyone within the vortex suffers triple damage of Assail.
